headline: Akamai Research: AI Bots Threaten the Foundation of Web-Based Business Models
summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online, today released a new State of the Internet (SOTI) report that reveals an alarming spike in automated traffic driven largely by AI-powered bots targeting websites across all industries.
